docs.lead_paragraph: The Fed chairman has said that he would back tax cuts or spending measures, so long as they are temporary.

headline.main: Bernanke Is Said to Support Stimulus
headline.print_headline: Fed’s Chairman Is Said to Back Aid to Economy

docs.snippet: The Fed chairman has said that he would back tax cuts or spending measures, so long as they are temporary.

byline.original: By EDMUND L. ANDREWS  and DAVID M. HERSZENHORN

docs.lead_paragraph: Conventional wisdom holds that health care costs, especially federal spending for Medicare, are driven by aging. Based on that belief, it's not illogical to conclude that as the baby boom generation ages, the sheer number of retirees will simply overwhelm the nation's ability to pay for all of them.

headline.main: A Promising Way of Containing Out-of-Control Medical Spending

docs.abstract: Conventional wisdom holds that health care costs, especially federal spending for Medicare, are driven by aging. Based on that belief, it's not illogical to conclude that as the baby boom generation ages, the sheer number of retirees will simply overwhelm the nation's ability to pay for all of them. The conventional wisdom, however, is wrong. [...]
